name: Mainely Fish
author: STORMYSCARLETT
summary: This is an easy, quick recipe that makes a beautiful presentation. Great served with rice and steamed asparagus.
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Center each piece of fish on an individual piece of aluminum foil (large enough to enclose the fish when folded)
Sprinkle each piece of fish with salt and pepper
Divide the sliced tomatoes, onion, and red and yellow peppers between the 6 pieces of fish, and place on top of the fillets
Sprinkle evenly with the capers and parsley
Drizzle each fillet with 1 tablespoon of olive oil and 1 tablespoon of lemon juice
Fold and seal the foil into a packet and place on a baking sheet
Leave 2 inches between each packet for even cooking
Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes
Let rest for 5 minutes and unwrap
